page.title: 12Housing in S.E. Guildford
page.content:
The Guildford, Shalford and Chilworth areas are mostly residential. In Guildford most of the houses are large Victorian residences and some have been converted into flats and offices. There are also some council flats.
Shalford has mostly Victorian houses, most of which are detached. More modern houses are semi-detached. Chilworth has had a new estate built in the last few years. Most of the other houses are much older. The original settlement of Chilworth grew up along the road.
Residential areas on the downs, like the Chantries and White Lane, include large houses with big gardens. Many of the roads are private. The majority of the inhabitants are elderly and have lived there for a long time.
